劤字的基本解释

劤
jìn

劤
jìng
古同“劲”。

劤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìng］
［《廣韻》居正切，去勁，見。］
亦作“劤1”。“劲1”的繁体字。
(1)强健有力。
(2)战斗力强。
(3)势力强大。
(4)风势强劲。
(5)笔法遒劲。
(6)刚强。
(7)坚固，坚硬。
(8)加强。
[②]［jìn］
亦作“劤2”。“劲2”的繁体字。
(1)力量，力气。
(2)神态；情绪。
(3)样子。
(4)趣味；兴趣。
(5)指某种程度，限度。

劤字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　劤； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页146第19
【唐韻】【集韻】?居焮切，斤去聲。【埤蒼】多力也。又【集韻】許斤切，音欣。又許謹切，欣上聲。又歷德切，音勒。義?同。

劤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
劤字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
劤
jìn
劤
jìng
Gu Tong is "strength".
劤
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìng］
["Guangyun" is tangent, go for strength, see you. ]
Also known as "劤1". The traditional characters of "劲1".
(1) Strong and strong.
(2) Strong combat effectiveness.
(3) Strong forces.
(4) The wind is strong.
(5) The brushwork is strong.
(6) Strong.
(7) Sturdy and hard.
(8) Strengthen.
[②]［jìn］
Also known as "劤2". The traditional characters of "劲2".
(1) Strength, strength.
(2) Demeanor; emotion.
(3) State.
(4) Interest; interest.
(5) Refers to a certain degree, limit.
劤
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Li Zi Department] 　劤; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 146 Page 19
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ju Yan cuts, the catty is gone. [Picang] Duo Li also. [Jiyun] Xu Jinqie, Yinxin. Xu Jinqie again, Xin said. And Li Deqi, Yin Le. Righteous? Same.
